name: tm_account__snp
description: This table captures a snapshot of account details and related product information at specific points in time.

columns.name: product_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the product associated with the account.

columns.name: product_version_id
columns.description: Identifier for the version of the product associated with the account.

columns.name: opening_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the account was opened.

columns.name: sif
columns.description: A specific identifier related to the account, possibly a system or integration reference.

columns.name: dlh_created_time
columns.description: Timestamp when the record was created in the data lakehouse.

columns.name: dlh_partition_date
columns.description: Date used for partitioning data in the data lakehouse.

columns.name: dlh_source
columns.description: Source system from which the data was obtained.

columns.name: dlh_processed_time
columns.description: Timestamp when the data was processed in the data lakehouse.

columns.name: year
columns.description: Year part of the date when the record was processed or created.

columns.name: month
columns.description: Month part of the date when the record was processed or created.

columns.name: day
columns.description: Day part of the date when the record was processed or created.
